thread.section_title: Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Suits the purpose
thread.title_full: Suits the purpose - Review of Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: StephaneHug
title: Suits the purpose
text: Fine hotel which suits the purpose of an airport hotel. Not more, not less. Near to the airport, clean rooms. Unfortunately no restaurant where you can grab a bite after a long flight but opposite the street, there is a restaurant at the Marriott. Breakfast ok; like the pancake machine! Fitness Center very dirty, hasn't seen a cleaning mop for quite a while...
